short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make available time slot templates for easy scheduling via text message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever being asked to provide your available timeslots for some meeting?

for example, something like this,

4/8 (Mon) 10:00~13:00
4/8 (Mon) 14:30~15:30
4/8 (Mon) 16:00~18:30
4/9 (Tue) 10:00~12:00
4/9 (Tue) 14:00~16:30
4/9 (Tue) 17:30~18:30

I was spending like 5 mins to write down this format based on google calendar,
so I automated process as chrome extension.

Enjoy!!
